ygData.subject: Mallet & Lake R
ygData.msgSnippet: Lake Rathe does not have to be 18+ in groups. If I go there just to fight gnolls a necromancer can do it at 15. At night I just sit down away from the ruins
ygData.messageBody:
Lake Rathe does not have to be 18+ in groups. If I go there just to fight
gnolls a necromancer can do it at 15. At night I just sit down away from the
ruins and don't fight skeles.

As for the mallet it is for a quest, I'm not sure which one but it is for a
quest. You also have to put the mallet together I thought there were four
pieces though.

>Message: 4
> Date: Tue, 18 May 1999 16:44:20 -0500
> From: "Simon" <simon21@...>
>Subject: Re: Fast ways to level as a Paladin, Druid, or Shaman?
>
>
>Anyone know where a lvl 9 cleric could hunt and level REALLY fast. I know
>in N Ro i can kill bugs (scarabs and tarantulas) but they give shit for
>loot. I have partied with a lvl 10 warrior and lvl 10 bard and kicked ass
>at derv camps, but it's too much work finding people willing to party to
>derv hunt. I was wondering if there was anywhere that was REALLY easy to
>lvl at, or like a place where only Mummys spawn, that would work the best.
>I heard HighPass was good, but from others i heard it's for lvl 15-25
>people. I also heard Lake Rathe was the best, but I'd have to party, and
>hardly any people are there. Any info?
>
>
>
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>___________________________________________________________________________
____

>
>Lake Rathe is for like AT LEAST lvl 18's in groups...good luck+ACE-
>Try fighting Undead...befallen would be one place to go.
>Also, there is a camp (ruins) in the East Commons, just west of the tunnel
>that leads to Nort Ro...irs along the south zone border. Skells and ghouls
>mostly I think...make sure you /con them some will come up red to me
>(lvl12).
>
